title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Remote Teacher Training Program: Learning Design-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational science education theories and field experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can deepen their understanding of science education theories using self-directed learning materials (SLM) and apply them to project-based problem-solving.
Learners strengthen science education design competencies reflecting real classroom scenarios through collaborative activities with peer teachers.
Learners can establish and implement science class improvement plans using self-assessment and feedback systems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
